mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tracheonomy set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: R. and H. Mathieu Fils
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The set is contained in case with the following text stamped on the interior: "Maison L. Mathieu R& H Matheiu Fils Sr5. 113 Bard Street Germain Paris". The set includes the following items: forceps mathieu, 17; unidentified instrument, mathieu 4; tracheotomy tube, 3.5 cm MAT [_]L 2 9 0; tracheonomy tube, 5 cm; tracheonmy tube, 4.5 cm; tracheonomy tube insert, 4.5 cm; tracheonomy tube, 4 cm; tracheonomy tube, 3cm; unidentified wooden instrument.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
